src/hooks/useOnboardingTour.ts.description: Custom hook pattern for onboarding tour: uses localStorage for persistence (STORAGE_KEYS pattern), integrates with useAuth for user context, uses requestAnimationFrame for DOM readiness detection, exports storage utilities for testing purposes.

src/components/OnboardingTour.tsx.description: Analytics integration in tour callback: Uses hasTrackedStartRef to prevent duplicate start events on tour restarts. Tracks 4 analytics events: tour started (on first STEP_BEFORE), tour completed (STATUS.FINISHED), tour skipped (STATUS.SKIPPED), step viewed (EVENTS.STEP_AFTER). All async tracking functions are called with void operator to handle promises without blocking.

src/lib/analytics.ts.description: Analytics tracking service pattern: Uses localStorage queue for client-side analytics storage (capped at 100 events), provides generic trackEvent function plus specific tour tracking helpers (trackTourStarted, trackTourCompleted, trackTourSkipped, trackStepViewed). Integrates with supabase for user ID retrieval. Uses TOUR_EVENTS constant object for type-safe event names. Logs to console in development mode via import.meta.env.DEV check.
